mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS cartNo , C.CART_ID , C.BOOK_ID , B.BOOK_NM , B.BOOK_COVER , B.BOOK_COVER_PATH , B.BOOK_PUBL_CO , B.BOOK_WRITER , B.BOOK_AMT , B.BOOK_AMT - (B.BOOK_AMT*B.BOOK_DISCNT) AS BOOK_DISCNT , C.MEMBER_ID , C.INS_DT , C.UDT_DT FROM BOOK_CART C , BOOK B WHERE C.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
